DOC.brief_summary: Controlled , multicenter , non-inferiority trial compare rate access site complication ( ASC ) 4French ( 4F ) vs. 6French ( 6F ) femoral access endovascular intervention .
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year minimum age require local regulation Ability walk Subject must willing sign patient Informed Consent ( PIC ) Patient infrainguinal artery lesion ( ) suitable treated ambulatory endovascular intervention No possibility ambulatory management Physical fitness classify ASA ≥ 4 ( American Society Anaesthesiologists ) Coagulation disorder Acute ischemia Less 1month live expectancy Pregnant breast feeding female females intend become pregnant time study ( pregnancy test require woman child bear potential ) Subject currently enrol medical drug study reach primary outcome measure Patient contraindicate antiplatelet therapy , anticoagulant antithrombotics Other access common femoral Home alone first night
